com.articheck.android.utilities
Class Json.ConditionReportContentsJsonWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.articheck.android.utilities.Json.ConditionReportContentsJsonWrapper
Enclosing class:
Json
public static class Json.ConditionReportContentsJsonWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper around a condition report's decoded JSON contents. It can either start of with the existing JSONObject corresponding to the contents or start off from scratch.

Author:
ai

initialize

private void initialize()
Convert the JSONObject contents in json_object into a directed graph. This is the inverse of updateJsonObject().

private java.util.Set<Json.ConditionReportContentsJsonWrapper.Node> getSectionNodes()

getSectionNode

private Json.ConditionReportContentsJsonWrapper.Node getSectionNode(java.lang.String section_name)
Get the Node instance in the graph corresponding to the section's name.

Parameters:
section_name - Name of the section.
Returns:
Node instance of the section, or null if the section could not be found.
